features: Size - Ruler range: Straight ruler: 30cm / 12 inch, triangle ruler: 13.5cm / 5 inch, 18.5cm / 7 inch, protractor: 180 degrees, 10cm; accuracy: 0.1cm, thickness: 1.68mm.

Feature - Geometry kit is laser etched with clear, non-fading graduations, ensuring every line and number can be easily and accurately read with less eye strain.

Application - This drawing ruler kit is perfect for professionals and amateurs. It is a must-have measuring and drawing tool for architects, engineers and carpenters, and can also be used for precise measurements in the classroom, office or home.
